# Mars Vista API - AI Agent Resources

# This file helps AI agents discover documentation optimized for LLM consumption.
# Human-friendly docs: https://marsvista.dev/docs

# TypeScript type definitions - copy into your project
types: https://marsvista.dev/docs/llm/types.ts

# Complete API reference in markdown
reference: https://marsvista.dev/docs/llm/reference.md

# OpenAPI 3.0 specification
openapi: https://marsvista.dev/docs/llm/openapi.json

# Interactive API explorer
swagger: https://api.marsvista.dev/swagger
